title: V.S. Naipaul's works
description:

Guerillas
Half a life
House for Mr. Biswas, A
In a free state
Magic seeds
Miguel Street
Mimic men, The
Mystic masseur, The
Nightwatchman's occurrence book, The: and other comic inventions
Way in the world, A: A sequence

Among the believers: An Islamic journey
Area of darkness, An: His discovery of India
Between father and son: Family letters
Beyond belief: Islamic excursions among the converted peoples
India: A million mutinies now
India: A wounded civilization
Literary occasions: Essays
Loss of El Dorado, The: A colonial history
Masque of Africa, The: Glimpses of African belief
Middle passage, The: Impressions of five colonial societies
Turn in the south, A
Writer and the world, The: Essays
Writer's people, A: Ways of looking and feeling

*************************

Remarks

1. To help people download some or all of the above titles, I would appreciate it if you could keep the torrent alive by seeding it for at least an hour after you have finished. Thanks for your co-operation.

2. As of November 8, 2014, the above titles are the only ones listed on Amazon Kindle store, Barnes and Noble Nook bookstore and Kobo Ebook store. (Let us hope that publishers will re-issue some of the author's other works in electronic format soon.)

3. The above titles are available in epub format only. They are of retail quality.

4. You may wish to use Calibre, a free and open-source software, to convert them to mobi or other formats
